comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is presumably the famous war correspondent, Frederick Palmer mailing a dispatch. [Frederick Palmer (January 29, 1873 - September 2, 1958) , American journalist and writer.] en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Palmer_(journalist) поща (Poshcha), which is what is written on the mailbox, is still on Bulgarian mailboxes, Since he was sent by the New York Times to cover the Balkan War in 1912, this picture could well be from that period. He spent the first year of World War I on the Western Front.
